metadata.title: CVE-2024-46726 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Ensure index calculation will not overflow[WHY & HOW]Make sure vmid0p72_idx, vnom0p8_idx and vmax0p9_idx calculation willnever overflow and exceess array size.This fixes 3 OVERRUN and 1 INTEGER_OVERFLOW issues reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
